text: Liang Jun () (April 1930 â€” 14 January 2020) was a Chinese tractor driver. She became a folk hero and model worker in Communist China. She is on China's one yuan banknote. She also was a politician. She was celebrated for breaking down class and gender barriers. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:20th-century Chinese politicians Category:People from Heilongjiang
title: Liang Jun (tractor driver)
